TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension
Public NotInheritable Class HttpBinding Inherits ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

summary.span: 表示已加入至 XML Web Service 內的 的擴充性項目。

span.span: Represents an extensibility element added to a within an XML Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個類別做為擴充性項目會指定資訊是由 HTTP 傳遞。The use of this class as an extensibility element specifies that information is to be passed by HTTP. 如需 XML Web 服務的通訊協定規格的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)。For more information about specification of protocols for XML Web services, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). 如需 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples 下列範例示範的典型用法`HttpBinding`類別。The following example shows a typical usage of the `HttpBinding` class. [!code-cpp[WebServices_HttpBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_HttpBinding/CPP/httpbinding.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebServices_HttpBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_HttpBinding/CS/httpbinding.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebServices_HttpBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_HttpBinding/VB/httpbinding.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 指定 XML 命名空間的 URI，表示用於 SOAP 的 HTTP 傳輸。

span.span: Specifies the URI for the XML namespace representing the HTTP transport for use with SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位值是"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/"。The field value is "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/". ## Examples 下列範例示範的典型用法`Namespace`欄位。The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `Namespace` field. [!code-cpp[HttpBinding_HttpBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpBinding_HttpBinding/CPP/httpbinding_ctor.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[HttpBinding_HttpBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpBinding_HttpBinding/CS/httpbinding_ctor.cs#2)] [!code-vb[HttpBinding_HttpBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpBinding_HttpBinding/VB/httpbinding_ctor.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Verb { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否會用 "GET" 或 "POST" 方法提出 HTTP 要求。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the HTTP request will be made using the "GET" or "POST" method.

value.span: 字串，包含兩個可能值 "GET" 或 "POST" 中的一個。

span.span: A string containing one of two possible values, "GET" or "POST".
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列範例會建立新`HttpBinding`並設定其`Verb`屬性。The following example creates a new `HttpBinding` and sets its `Verb` property. WebServices_HttpBinding#2WebServices_HttpBinding#2
